titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices of Ireland, Charles Porter, Tho. Coningesby. Whereas divers persons have been or are employ'd in or about their majesties hospitals in this kingdom, either marching with the army or fixt, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printerto [sic] the King and Queen at their Majesties printing-house on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at their Majesties castle of Dublin, this 9th day of December. 1691.".
Accounts of the royal hospitals to be sent in.--Steele.
Steele notation: Arms 199. employ'd persons usual.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
